transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir Durgesh bol raha hu sir India Mart se.
Executive: Ji Durgesh ji.
Customer: Sir aapne time nahi diya sir main wait kar raha hu sir aapka.
Executive: Wait thoda lunch ho gaya lunch ke baad call karta hu aapko.
Customer: To lunch kab tak hoga sir?
Executive: 2 baje ke baad.
Customer: To sir main actually main 3 baje connect karta hu sir 3 baje actually hamara bhi 2 baje lunch hota hai to main 3 baje apan hum log discuss kar lete hain video meeting kar lete hain okay sir.
Executive: Theek theek.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states executive did not give time and he was waiting.

- Customer asks when lunch will be over.



Resolution:

- Executive says he will call after lunch, around 2 PM.

- Customer proposes to connect at 3 PM for a video meeting due to their own lunch schedule.

- Executive agrees.



Next Steps: 

- Customer and executive will connect at 3 PM for a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

meeting schedule, video meeting
